story.title: Cats
story.instruction: Read the story and answer the questions
story.body: Some people have cats. Cats like to sleep. They can sleep all day. They like to sleep in the sun. Cats do not like to get wet. Cats like to eat meat. They like to drink milk. Cats are good pets.
